column4: Traffic;Kampong Thom: According to the Kampong Thom Provincial Police
column8: the police force of Kampong Svay District Police
column9: in cooperation with the Trapeang Russey Administrative Police Station
column10: arrested one of the perpetrators after a stick at the windshield of a passenger car.------The car was traveling from Kampong Thom to Preah Vihear province along National Road 62 in Vally Yav village
column14: the arrested man is mentally ill
column15: and has previously believed to have thrown rocks and other items at passing motorists. ------KHMERNOTE
